title: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: When removing a working set, the package view immediately updates.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Observe that the package view is filtered.
EB: When removing a working set, the package view should not immediately update in the background. The filtering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Remove the working set and observe the package view. 3. Closing the working set selection dialog should apply the filtering. 4. Pressing cancel should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
